channel.title: 100-days-of-code on Andi Rückauer
channel.description: Recent content in 100-days-of-code on Andi Rückauer

item.title: 100 Days of Code
item.description: Lately quite a few posts on the #100DaysOfCode challenge have come up on my Twitter timeline. I was curious what it is all about. So, I started to do some research and I really liked what I was reading. In this post I am writing about my own commitment to the challenge. If you want to know more about it yourself, start reading the initial article on medium or go straight to the official website.
